languages.text: "Я... помню". {n}Когда вы разжимаете хватку, друкари несколько мгновений смотрит на вас, чуть склонив голову.{/n} "И я буду помнить... если ты не утратишь хватку". {n}Глаза Маражая голодно блестят.{/n} "Поскольку ты уже пообещал{mf||а} мне Иремерисс... я оставлю тебя. Когда придет время убивать... дай мне знать".

"I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."
languages.original_text: "Я... помню". {n}Когда вы разжимаете хватку, друкари несколько мгновений смотрит на вас, чуть склонив голову.{/n} "И я буду помнить... если ты не утратишь хватку". {n}Глаза Маражая голодно блестят.{/n} "Поскольку ты уже пообещал{mf||а} мне Иремерисс... я оставлю тебя. Когда придет время убивать... дай мне знать".

traits.locale_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari remains kneeling for a few more seconds. Then he stands and looks at you, his head bowed slightly.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我……我明白。”{n}当你松开手之后，玛拉斋盯着你看了几秒钟，微微低下了头。{/n}“我不会忘记我的位置……只要你始终握紧缰绳。”{n}玛拉斋的双眼中闪烁着贪婪的光芒。{/n}“既然你已经答应将伊芮梅莉斯交给我……我就先离开吧。等你准备杀人的时候……告诉我就好。”
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: “我……我明白。”{n}当你松开手之后，玛拉斋依然在地上继续跪了几秒钟。随后，他站起身，看着你，微微低下了头。{/n}“我不会忘记我的位置……只要你始终握紧缰绳。”{n}玛拉斋的双眼中闪烁着贪婪的光芒。{/n}“既然你已经答应将伊芮梅莉斯交给我……我就先离开吧。等你准备杀人的时候……告诉我就好。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ…そうだ」{n}力を緩めると、デュカーリは数秒こちらを見つめてからほんの少し頭を下げた。{/n}「そして俺は自分の居場所を忘れない…お前の支配力さえ衰えなければな」{n}マラズハイの目がギラリと輝く。{/n}「イレメリスの件はすでに約束した通りだ…もう行く。殺す時が来たら…知らせろ」
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ…そうだ」{n}力を緩めると、デュカーリは数秒こちらを見つめてからほんの少し頭を下げた。{/n}「そして俺は自分の居場所を忘れない…お前の支配力さえ衰えなければな」{n}マラズハイの目がギラリと輝く。{/n}「イレメリスの件はすでに約束した通りだ…もう行く。殺す時が来たら…知らせろ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Lo... lo sé». {n}Cuando le sueltas, el Drukhari tete mira con la cabeza ligeramente inclinada durante unos segundos.{/n} «Y no olvidaré cuál es mi lugar... mientras tu mano tenga fuerza para agarrarme». {n}Los ojos de Marazhai tienen un brillo voraz.{/n} «Dado que ya me has prometido a Yremeryss... me marcho. Cuando llegue el momento de matar... avísame».
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: «Lo... lo entiendo». {n}Cuando le sueltas, el drukhari permanece arrodillado durante unos segundos. Luego se pone en pie y te mira con la cabeza ligeramente inclinada.{/n} «Y no olvidaré cuál es mi lugar... mientras tu mano tenga fuerza para agarrarme». {n}Los ojos de Marazhai tienen un brillo voraz.{/n} «Dado que ya me has prometido a Yremeryss... me marcho. Cuando llegue el momento de matar... avísame».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais très bien où est ma place... » {n}Lorsque vous desserrez votre étreinte, le Drukhari vous fixe du regard l'espace de quelques instants, la tête légèrement inclinée.{/n} « Et je ne l'oublierai pas... tant que vous me tiendrez fermement la bride, {n}ajoute-t-il, un éclat carnassier dans son regard.{/n} Puisque vous m'avez déjà promis la tête d'Yremeryss, je vais prendre congé jusqu'à nouvel ordre. Faites-moi savoir quand l'heure de la mise à mort sera venue. »
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais très bien où est ma place... » {n}Lorsque vous desserrez votre étreinte, le Drukhari reste à genoux quelques secondes de plus, puis il se relève et vous regarde, la tête légèrement inclinée.{/n} « Et je ne l'oublierai pas... tant que vous me tiendrez fermement la bride, {n}ajoute-t-il, un éclat carnassier dans son regard.{/n} Puisque vous m'avez déjà promis la tête d'Yremeryss, je vais prendre congé jusqu'à nouvel ordre. Faites-moi savoir quand l'heure de la mise à mort sera venue. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... schon." {n}Als du deinen Griff lockerst, starrt dich der Drukhari noch einige Sekunden lang mit leicht gesenktem Kopf an.{/n} "Und ich werde meinen Platz nicht vergessen ... solange Ihr weiter so hart zugreift." {n}Marazhais Augen leuchten gierig.{/n} "Da Ihr mir Yremeryss bereits versprochen habt ... Werde ich jetzt gehen. Wenn die Zeit für ihren Tod gekommen ist ... lasst es mich wissen."
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... schon." {n}Als du deinen Griff lockerst, starrt dich der Drukhari noch einige Sekunden lang mit leicht gesenktem Kopf an.{/n} "Und ich werde meinen Platz nicht vergessen ... solange Ihr weiter so hart zugreift." {n}Marazhais Augen leuchten gierig.{/n} "Da Ihr mir Yremeryss bereits versprochen habt ... Werde ich jetzt gehen. Wenn die Zeit für ihren Tod gekommen ist ... lasst es mich wissen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

languages.text: "Haddimi... Biliyorum." {n}Drukhari, elini bıraktığında birkaç saniyeliğine bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Başı hafifçe öne eğik.{/n} "Yerimi de unutmayacağım. İradeni kaybetmediğin sürece elbette..." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, aç kurtlar gibi parıldıyor.{/n} "Madem ki bana hâlihazırda Yremeryss'in sözünü verdin... Ben de seni rahat bırakacağım. Öldürme zamanı geldiğinde... Bana haber ver."
languages.original_text: "I... do." {n}When you release your hold, the Drukhari stares at you for a few seconds, his head slightly bowed.{/n} "And I will not forget my place... so long as you do not lose your grip." {n}Marazhai's eyes gleam ravenously.{/n} "As you have already promised me Yremeryss... I will leave you now. When it is time to kill... let me know."

traits.locale_text: "Haddimi... Biliyorum." {n}Drukhari, elini bıraktığında birkaç dakikalığına bakışlarını sana dikiyor. Başı hafifçe öne eğik.{/n} "Yerimi de unutmayacağım. İradeni kaybetmediğin sürece elbette..." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, aç kurtlar gibi parıldıyor.{/n} "Madem ki bana hâlihazırda Yremeryss'in sözünü verdin... Ben de seni rahat bırakacağım. Öldürme zamanı geldiğinde... Bana haber ver."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
